scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "tsconfig.tsbuildinfo" -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.setup:local: docker-compose up -d --wait && pnpm my-api prisma db push
scripts.setup:test: docker-compose up -d --wait && cd apps/my-api && pnpm dotenv -e ../../.env.test -- prisma db push --force-reset
scripts.reset:test: cd apps/my-api && pnpm dotenv -e ../../.env.test -- prisma db push --force-reset
